text: *Out-of-the-box Navigation / Menu.*   Should I expect to see navigation / menu on the Boilerplate templates out-of-the box like in the Previews?   I do not see any menus / navigation when I preview pages created from the boilerplate templates.   Thanks all!

Hey <@U04P6E82SDB>,

Looking into a few things related to this. Can you confirm that you have a menu setup in settings? *Settings > Website > Navigation.*

It should be pulling in whatever navigation is set to a default nav in the settings there, unless you specify to override that in the module itself.

That being said if you click on the header element you should bet taken to the Global Partial editor. From there, in the left pane, if you click into the contents tab you should see an element there called `Primary navigation` . If you click on that module you should be able to create/add a menu there.

<@UQWGKUEN7> thanks for the reply!
>  It should be pulling in whatever navigation is set to a default nav in the settings there
That did not happen for me.
>  That being said if you click on the header element you should bet taken to the Global Partial editor. From there, in the left pane, if you click into the contents tab you should see an element there called `Primary navigation`
Yes, that worked! Thank you!
